title: Account names missing in Cloud Cost report filters for AWS integrations
content:
Cloud account names are missing from Cloud Cost report filters after you configure the billing data retrieval and cloud account import integrations for AWS. Only the Account IDs are displayed.

Cause

This issue occurs because the cloud account data synchronization and subsequent cloud billing data collection have not yet occurred.

Solution

To resolve this issue, manually synchronize the cloud account, and then collect the billing data:

  1. Log in to Agent Interface as the cloud integration administrator.
  2. In the main menu, go to Administration > Utilities > Integrations.
  3. Select the affected cloud account in the left-hand menu, and then select the the cloud account sync scenario.
  4. Click Run scenario, and then click OK to confirm the operation.
  5. In the main menu, go to Administration > Providers > Cloud Cost Data Providers.
  6. Click the Settings icon on the affected cloud cost data provider, and then click Start Collection.
